definition: to meet the standard required/qualified/eligible (voter etc)
100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]

sentences.english: Ji rummages for fake or substandard goods in shops.
sentences.chinese: 纪万昌在商店里搜寻假商品或不合格的商品。

sentences.english: The applicants who pass the qualification pre-evaluation will receive the formal invitation for Levy.
sentences.chinese: 主办单位向资审合格的应征人发出正式邀请。

sentences.english: Scholarships will be canceled for those who cannot pass the health examination.
sentences.chinese: 入学体检不合格者，奖学金资格将被取消。

sentences.english: Any reworked non-conforming products must go through the re-inspection processes after rework.
sentences.chinese: 任何返工后的不合格品均须重新检查。

sentences.english: You may also forward us a list of qualified drivers from your respective countries for our reference.
sentences.chinese: 你也可以自贵国传一份合格选手的名单给我们参考。

sentences.english: The regulations also ban unregulated health practitioners from commissioning or formulating their own medicines.
sentences.chinese: 法规还严禁不合格的中医医生从业或配制自己的药方。

sentences.english: You have to level with the employee who isnot measuring up.
sentences.chinese: 你必须把自己与那些不合格的员工摆在同一个水平上。

sentences.english: The manufacturer shall provide the factory quality certification and factory check out report with testing data.
sentences.chinese: 供应商提供的出厂合格证书和厂内试验报告。

sentences.english: As a qualified soldier, you must keep your uniform tidy and have powerful posture.
sentences.chinese: 作为一个合格的军人，必须仪表整洁军姿威武。

sentences.english: These are riots of defective and disqualified consumers.
sentences.chinese: 这些是有缺陷的和不合格的消费者的暴乱。

sentences.english: The university teachers shoulder for the society raise the qualified professional personnel's important mission.
sentences.chinese: 高校教师肩负为社会培养合格专门人才的重要使命。

sentences.english: The measurement devices used in hydrologic monitoring shall pass the inspection according to law.
sentences.chinese: 水文监测所使用的计量器具应当依法经检定合格。

sentences.english: Report the examined and approved qualified suppliers list of this project to company for record.
sentences.chinese: 将本项目审定合格的供货商名单报公司备案。

sentences.english: XJTLU's Masters degrees are validated by the University of Liverpool (UK).
sentences.chinese: 合格毕业生将被授予英国利物浦大学硕士学位。

sentences.english: With the original process, the qualification rate of the liquation carbonide was only 75.
sentences.chinese: 原工艺下液析碳化物合格率仅为75。

sentences.english: Only those that pass the examination shall be granted approval.
